mapper.select: SELECT DATE(created_at) AS signup_date, COUNT(*) AS count FROM USER WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(created_at)
SELECT DATE(visit_time) AS visitDate, COUNT(*) AS count FROM VISIT_LOG WHERE visit_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(visit_time)
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') AS sale_month, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM ORDERS WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDERS WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_price), 0) FROM ORDERS WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDERS WHERE (order_status = 'CANCELLED' OR order_status = 'RETURNED') AND updated_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
SELECT COALESCE(t.tier_level, 1) AS level, COUNT(*) AS count FROM USER u LEFT JOIN USER_TIER t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY COALESCE(t.tier_level, 1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VISIT_LOG (user_id, visitor_id, visit_time, page_url, referrer_url, user_agent, device_type, ip_address) VALUES (#{userId}, #{visitorId}, #{visitTime}, #{pageUrl}, #{referrerUrl}, #{userAgent}, #{deviceType}, #{ipAddress})
